mapper.select: SELECT em.id AS maker_enterprise_id, m.id AS maker_id, e.id AS enterprise_id, m.phone_number, m. NAME, m.idcard_no, m.bank_card_no, m.bank_card_verify_status, a.online_aggrement_url,a.sign_state, a.sign_date FROM diyi_maker_enterprise em INNER JOIN diyi_maker m ON em.maker_id = m.id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise e ON e.id = em.id INNER JOIN diyi_agreement a ON a.maker_id = m.id WHERE em.enterprise_id =#{param1} AND em.is_deleted = 0 AND m.is_deleted = 0 AND e.is_deleted = 0 AND a.is_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 1
